message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about $135?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about $129?
I'm getting close to your price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $128. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
